get.summary: Get the GeoJSON polygons that are the intersection of two contours
get.description:
This will returns an array that contains all the GeoJSON polygons that are the
    intersection of the two contours provided.

parameters.name: id

schema.description: The ID of the first contour.
schema.title: Id

parameters.description: The ID of the first contour.

parameters.name: contour

schema.description: The ID of the second contour.
schema.title: Contour

parameters.description: The ID of the second contour.

schema.title: Response Get Intersections Contours  Id  Intersections Get

type.title: Type
type.description: Fixed value (but must be provided) to be conformant with GeoJson.

coordinates.description: Coordinates of each points of a contour.

type.title: Type
type.description: Fixed value (but must be provided) to be conformant with GeoJson.

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description:
Coordinates of the point (longitude, latitude) in the form of a list of length=2.
        Value must be correctly bounded:
            -180 < longitude < 180
            -90 < latitude < 90

data.description: The GeoJson representation of a point.
The GeoJson representation of a point.
